name: Wish You Well
description:
Two friends (?) exchange letters through a well in their garden. But this, too, shall pass.

Made for Global Game Jam 2022 ! Theme : "Duality"

Cover Art by Marine Gambier

MUSICS : 

Ferris Wheel - Deltarune / Toby Fox
Small shock - Undertale / Toby Fox
Numbers - Omori / Omocat
Come and see - Omori / Omocat
Calm - Omori / Omocat
Remember to be patient - Omori / Omocat
